name: google-jobs-api-actor
title: Google Jobs API Actor
description: Searches for job listings using Google Jobs API or Bing Search API via SearchAPI.io, filters results, and saves to database (email enrichment handled by web viewer)

input.title: Input schema for Google Jobs API Actor

queries.title: Search Queries
queries.description: List of search queries to run
default: restaurant chef jobs New York NY
restaurant chef jobs Los Angeles CA
restaurant manager jobs New York NY
restaurant manager jobs Los Angeles CA
hotel chef jobs New York NY
hotel chef jobs Los Angeles CA
hotel manager jobs New York NY

maxPagesPerQuery.title: Max Pages Per Query
maxPagesPerQuery.description: Maximum number of pages to fetch per query

saveToDataset.title: Save to Dataset
saveToDataset.description: Whether to save results to Apify dataset

pushToDatabase.title: Push to Database
pushToDatabase.description: Whether to push results to external database

databaseUrl.title: Database URL
databaseUrl.description: URL of the external database (if pushing to database)

databaseTable.title: Database Table
databaseTable.description: Name of the database table to insert jobs into

deduplicateJobs.title: Deduplicate Jobs
deduplicateJobs.description: Whether to check for and skip duplicate jobs when pushing to database

fullTimeOnly.title: Full-Time Only
fullTimeOnly.description: Whether to filter for full-time positions only

excludeFastFood.title: Exclude Fast Food
excludeFastFood.description: Whether to exclude fast food restaurants

includeWebsiteData.title: Include Website Data
includeWebsiteData.description: Whether to collect company website URLs (email enrichment handled by web viewer)

testMode.title: Test Mode
testMode.description: Run in test mode (process fewer jobs and only send email to primary recipient)

searchEngine.title: Search Engine
searchEngine.description: Which search engine to use for job searches
